long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Meet Chat Flow

Flow the chat like Niko video

Usage
1. Open the chat to get the dom.
2. Switch the toggle.

Updates
2022/08/16 v1.0.1  
Add a border so that the text can be seen even if the background is white.

2022/08/21 v1.0.2  
Fixed the following items
- Problem that there is a little lag in the time until characters flow on the screen.
- The problem that characters are hidden at the bottom of the screen.

2022/08/23 v1.0.3
speed adjustment

2022/08/24 v1.0.4
bug fix

2022/09/26 v1.0.5
Supports Google Meet Update

2022/10/17 v1.0.6
fix index

2022/10/19 v1.0.7
Eliminate path dependency to support update
